message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $20,000 is a bit too steep for me.  I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay around $10,000 for it.  What do you think?

Hi Bob, thanks for the offer.  I understand that my initial price was a bit high for you.  While I value the product at a higher price, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. I believe this offer represents a fair compromise.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you being willing to negotiate.  $17,000 is still a bit more than I had in mind.  Would you be open to something closer to $11,500?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate as well.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $16,000.  This is my final offer.

Alice, thanks for your time. I understand this is your final offer, but I'm afraid I can't meet that price. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. This is my final offer.  Let me know if it works for you.
